vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἄρτος, ὁ,
cake or loaf of wheat-bread, mostly in plural, [Refs 8th c.BC+]; ἄρτος οὖλος a whole loaf, [Refs]; collectively, bread, δούλιον ἄρτον ἔδων[Refs 7th c.BC+]; opposed to μᾶζα (porridge), [Refs 5th c.BC+] —Freq. in all writers.
__II ἄρτος· βόλος τις, καὶ ὁ Ἀθηναίων ξένος, [Refs 5th c.AD+]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
(loaf of) bread, food
bread; a loaf, or thin cake of bread, Mt. 26:26; food, Mt. 15:2; Mk. 3:20; bread, maintenance, living, necessaries of life, Mt. 6:11; Lk. 11:3; 2Thess. 3:8
vocabInfos._es_Definition: pan, una barra de pan ; comida
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 麵包
1a) 一般的
1b) 獻祭用的
1c) 主餐用的
2) 食物
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 面包
1a) 一般的
1b) 献祭用的
1c) 主餐用的
2) 食物
